description: Classic vanilla cupcake with a vanilla bean creme icing.
Classic chocolate cupcake with a mousse topping. Dusted with cocoa.
Deep red cupcake with a cream cheese icing and crumble.
Soft lemon cupcake made with fresh lemon curd and topped with a zest-infused buttercream icing.
Classic vanilla cupcake on a graham cracker base with chocolate eggs and pistachio icing.
Rich dark chocolate cake infused with Earl Gray, topped with a galactic buttercream and shining sprinkles.
Gluten free chocolate cupcakes with a coffee-infused icing and mini chips.
Crispy golden cupcakes with a creamy vanilla icing. Did we mention they are gluten-free?
Vanilla cupcake with toffee drizzle and icing. Topped with a refreshing cinnamon wafer.
Vanilla cupcake with flecks of oreo cookie in the batter. Tasty buttercream icing and an oreo, the perfect cookies and cream flavour.
Gluten-free chocolate cupcake with a glazed vanilla bean icing and a cherry.
